Significant C Preprocessor Macros
[SHORE Storage Manager Application Programming Interface (SSM API)]

Collaboration diagram for Significant C Preprocessor Macros:

Detailed Description

See the "Defines" sections in the files listed below to see significant macros used in the storage manager source code. (This is not a complete list.)

The macros that are useful for value-added-server code are those found in w_rc.h.
